name: RTC Exeter
overview: In this rail management simulation you are in charge of all locomotive traffic on one of the main routes of the old Great Western Railway, the Bristol to Exeter line is 85 miles long and dates back to the 1840s. Currently the principal operator on the route is First Great Western, with high-speed trains providing fast services from London through to the West Country and multiple units handling local stopping services. You must not only keep the trains rolling on time but you must make work hard to avoid disaster on a daily basis.
